debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose, to amend the Education Act 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 to give the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities (CRU) the legislative remit to develop a code of practice for water service outages and to amend the Water Services Act 2014 to establish a dispute resolution mechanism for customer complaints regarding service interruptions and outages.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Uisce (Uimh. 2), 2013 chun go dtabharfar don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais (CRF) an sainchúram reachtach chun cód cleachtais le haghaidh éarthaí seirbhíse uisce a fhorbairt, agus do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Uisce, 2014 chun sásra um réiteach díospóidí a bhunú le haghaidh gearáin ó chustaiméirí i ndáil le hidirbhristeacha sa tseirbhís agus éarthaí seirbhíse.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999 to give the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities (CRU) the legislative remit to effectively monitor wholesale and retail prices in the energy market; to increase the frequency and level of reporting; to effectively monitor and regulate hedging practices; to strengthen the Commission's powers to monitor anti-competitive behaviour of gas and electricity suppliers; to expand the Commission's role in consumer protection; to strengthen the Commission's power to address energy affordability; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun go dtabharfar don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais (CRF) an sainchúram reachtach chun faireachán éifeachtach a dhéanamh ar phraghsanna mórdhíola agus miondíola sa mhargadh fuinnimh; do mhéadú mhinicíocht agus leibhéal an tuairiscithe; do dhéanamh faireachán agus rialáil éifeachtach ar chleachtais fálaithe; do neartú na gcumhachtaí atá ag an gCoimisiún chun faireachán a dhéanamh ar iompar frithiomaíoch soláthróirí gáis agus leictreachais; do leathnú an róil atá ag an gCoimisiún i gcosaint tomhaltóirí; do neartú na cumhachta atá ag an gCoimisiún chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar inacmhainneacht fuinnimh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Standing Charges) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999 to give the Commission for Regulation of Utilities (CRU) the legislative remit required to effectively monitor and regulate standing charges on electricity and gas bills, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun go dtabharfar don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais (CRF) an sainchúram reachtach is gá chun faireachán agus rialáil éifeachtach a dhéanamh ar bhuanmhuirir ar bhillí leictreachais agus gáis, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Cost of Renewables Taskforce Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications to establish a cross-departmental taskforce to examine the cost of producing renewable energy in Ireland; to provide for this taskforce to consult with stakeholders and deliver within six months policy recommendations to the Minister on ways to reduce the cost of producing renewable energy per megawatt-hour.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar an Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide tascfhórsa trasrannach a bhunú chun scrúdú a dhéanamh ar an gcostas a bhaineann le fuinneamh inathnuaite a tháirgeadh in Éirinn; do dhéanamh socrú chun go rachaidh an tascfhórsa sin i gcomhairle le páirtithe leasmhara agus chun go ndéanfaidh sé, laistigh de shé mhí, moltaí beartais a sheachadadh ar an Aire maidir le bealaí chun laghdú a dhéanamh ar an gcostas in aghaidh na huaire meigeavata a bhaineann le fuinneamh inathnuaite a tháirgeadh.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Thascfhórsa um Chostas Athnuaiteán, 2022

debates.showAs: Planning and Development Regulations (Amendment) (Solar Energy for Schools and Community Buildings) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for the installation of solar panels on school and community buildings without the need for planning permission, and for this purpose to amend S.I. No. 600 of 2001.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le grianphainéil a shuiteáil ar fhoirgnimh scoile agus phobail gan gá a bheith le cead pleanála agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú I.R. Uimh. 600 de 2001.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development Regulations (Amendment) (Solar Energy for Schools and Community Buildings) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá na Rialacháin um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Grianfhuinneamh le haghaidh Scoileanna agus Foirgnimh Phobail), 2022

debates.showAs: Green Hydrogen Strategy Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Green Hydrogen Strategy Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications to draft and publish a hydrogen strategy within six months of the passing of this Act.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar an Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide straitéis hidrigine a dhréachtú agus a fhoilsiú laistigh de shé mhí tar éis an tAcht seo a rith.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Straitéis Hidrigine Glaise, 2022

debates.showAs: Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require pharmaceutical companies, medical equipment suppliers and their servants or agents, to declare payments, gifts, donations or other transfers of values provided to healthcare professionals or health care organisations on an annual basis.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar chuideachtaí cógaisíochta, ar sholáthraithe trealaimh liachta agus ar sheirbhísigh nó gníomhairí dá gcuid dearbhú a dhéanamh i leith íocaíochtaí, bronntanas, síntiús nó aistrithe eile ar luach a sholáthraítear do ghairmithe cúraim sláinte nó d’eagraíochtaí cúraim sláinte ar bhonn bliantúil.

debates.showAs: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999, to include explicit provision for the Minister to provide policy direction to the Commission for Regulation of Utilities, to introduce a moratorium on disconnections of gas and electricity supply to domestic customers for non-payment during the annual fuel allowance season or during other periods of time the Minister may deem appropriate.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun socrú follasach a áireamh ann maidir leis an Aire do sholáthar treorú beartais don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais, do thabhairt isteach moratóir ar dhíchónascthaí soláthair gáis agus leictreachais do chustaiméirí baile mar gheall ar neamhíoc le linn an tséasúir bhliantúil liúntais breosla nó le linn tréimhsí ama eile a mheasfaidh an tAire is cuí.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialáil Leictreachais (Leasú) (Díchónascthaí sa Gheimhreadh a Thoirmeasc), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021
